content: मुमुक्षु {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Desirous of releasing or liberating. {@--2@} Wishing to discharge. {@--3@} About to shoot (arrows &c.); <ls>R. 9. 58.</ls> {@--4@} Wishing to be free from worldly existence, striving after final emancipation. --क्षुः A sage striving after final emancipation or beatitude; अंतर्यश्च मुमुक्षुभिर्नियमितप्राणादिभिर्मृग्यते <ls>V. 1. 1</ls>; <ls>Ku. 2. 51</ls>; <ls>Bg. 4. 15.</ls>
